alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:54PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otero and north central Las Animas Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 154 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Thatcher, or 31 miles southwest of La Junta, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Otero and north central Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County
